import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './sidebar.css' import axios from 'axios'; export default function Sidebar(){ const [cat,setCats]=useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ const getCats = async()=> { const res = await axios.get("/categories"); setCats(res.data); } },[]) return(
